title: Finding peace amidst the Stellenbosch mountains
text:
Matthew 11:28-30
“Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my yoke is easy and my burden is light.”

title: Regina van Heerden
text: Regina Barbara van Heerden née Pretorius

title: Jan & Hildegard du Plessis
text:
Jan Johannes du Plessis
Hildegard Wilhemina du Plessis née Schumann

title: Stellenbosch
text:
edit _quarto.yml file for website structure and .qmd files for content
quarto render
cp -a _site/* ../stellenbosch.duplessis.org/
cd ../stellenbosch.duplessis.org/
git commit -m "Yadayada etc."
git push
It uses https://github.com/fduple/stellenbosch.duplessis.org as repository and “orca-app” on digitalocean.com for automatic deployment within a minute of updating the repository.
